place_description: Your newest neighborhood café, serving specialty coffee, beer, and wine with passion

reviews_data.review_text: not a big coffee drinker, but i hear they have great coffee! i recently got a lavender earl grey tea and it was fantastic. their matcha is also good!

The atmosphere, the staff, the drinks, it's all just perfect!!!  Everyone is so nice, Angel and Alexis and everyone else always greet me with a welcoming smile and genuine conversation if they have time.  On a busy workday, this is sometimes the highlight of my day!  The big bun is delicious and so is their granola.  I love their app and rewards.  I love having this place in my neighborhood!

Love this location in particular! Their service was much better than the providence location. The coffee was good, service was fast & I appreciate the menu variety. They have pretty cozy seating options on the inside & outside
My favorite coffee shop in the area. Killer coffee, friendly employees, and a nice environment combine for a great experience every time.
They have a cosy outdoor area which is perfect for sitting and enjoying your coffee. Very friendly service too!
Great staff, great coffee. Summit is consistent in its quality, and this location is no different.

I'm usually there for the run club, and I appreciate everything this location does for us! Excellent coffee. Would love the chocolate covered strawberry to come back, but the seasonal menu always has something fun to try. Pro tip: mobile order to skip the line!

This delightful hidden green of a coffee shop located in the heart of Plaza Midwood had just what I needed - an iced chai and a berry lemon scone. With some artwork on the walls and a collection of cowboy hats that remind me of my time living in a converted barn, the decor is simple yet cozy. The music is present yet not overwhelming. The service is with a smile and friendly. Wifi is free.
It's definitely worth a visit.
$6+ latte that's nothing to talk about in terms of taste and quality. Went in around 8am and they had ZERO to eat. Couldn't understand that. Won't be back.
This place has an amazing staff and vibe. The drinks are delicious. It is a great place to hang out and read.
Absolutely love this place. Such a welcoming staff and environment. Hands down the best iced vanilla latte.

I stopped by with a friend on Saturday morning and I had a lovely time! The baristas were SO friendly, and I thought the menu was very organized, with seasonal specials. There's a lot more seating inside than the outside signage would suggest, with lots of ports, board games, a printer (!?) and plenty of tables. I ordered an iced vanilla latte and a cinnamon puff, and both came out quickly and tasted amazing!
very good quality coffee and service is amazing. there is an ample amount of parking as well.

I started attending the Summit Coffee Friday morning run through Charlotte Running Club! First, I want to thank the entire staff for serving us and working extremely hard to fulfill our coffee orders after the run. Second, the online app is amazing - the key is to put your coffee order in when you're starting the last mile of your run! :) Overall, very impressed with the service/atmosphere and will definitely be back.
Great coffee and pastries.

Great addition to the neighborhood. I don't drink coffee or get too excited about little pastries but my wife does and says it's great. Always enjoy working from here for a few hours, easy to find a quiet corner and the shaded patio is nice

Every thing tastes like a dessert* in the best way! It's always a treat to visit Summit on the Plaza!

*edited to add: my 8 year old was with me today and urged me to write a review so this is his contribution!

In all seriousness, I'm a SOTP regular and love the vibe, staff and coffee  keep up the great work!!
So friendly!
All of this chain's locations do not have any sugar free options.
Parker the manager is the best! She is so friendly and informative, she knows her coffee! Thank you for such a great explanation of the difference between certain coffee.
Great service, great energy. & the drinks taste amazing. They make an awesome Matcha as well!
Cutest spot to get matcha and work in a cozy environment, great lighting inside and can't wait to use the outdoor patio when the weather warm up

Nice little spot near Plaza Midwood for a cup of coffee and breakfast. Inside is nice and cozy with an outdoor space that is dog friendly. I had the blueberry lemonade scone and americano and my fiance had the peppermint hot chocolate and tomato feta danish.
I don't go anywhere else!

I was in Charlotte for an event and just googled closest coffeehouse near me. Summit popped up and I am so glad. First the service was wonderful. Both of the ladies there smiled the entire time, taking orders and making coffee. It seemed like they actually loved their jobs and these days that's rare. So 5 for the customer service. It was a cute shop but I honestly was in and out after my coffee was done. I'm sure if you had time to lounge there it would be nice. I also loved the art in bathroom (random I know) but those tiny details make huge differences. Okay now to the coffee. I ordered a Large Lavender Latte with 2 extra shots of espresso & oat milk. I also grabbed the granola to eat in the car for my long drive home. That coffee was so dang good I didn't even get a photo. It had the perfect amount of lavender & foam. I mean it was silky and so easy to drink. Had they not been closed on my way home I would've returned to get a second cup. The granola was yummy too, a bit messy in the car but I had enough when I got home the next morning I used it on my yogurt and it was delicious. Wondering can I order and have it shipped? Any ways this little gem is a must try!!!!

Stopped at 4pm to sit and have a coffee in a ceramic mug and I was told that because it was close to closing time (closing is at 5:30 and it was 4pm) they had to serve the coffee in a to go disposable paper plastic cup. I was really disappointed. Really? How long does it take to leave pit he mugs in the dishwasher and call it a day?
Such a calm place to sit and sip on coffee. Plenty of parking and all the staff is always nice.

4.5 stars!!

Super friendly staff, and cozy inside. Holiday drinks were very nice--i loved my Tiramisu and my girlfriend really loved her Peppermint Mocha.
Friendly staff, chill vibe. Love the salted caramel latte, but disappointed  they charge for non dairy milk now.
Great spot to drink. Great spot to get work done.  Not the best spot for a quiet/private meeting.
Delicious tea! Baristas were very nice.
Excellent service, delicious food, friendly staff.
Great selection and freshest Coffee
Decent coffee shop. I appreciate the discount provided when you bring your own glade for the coffee. Occasionally find some of the baked goods a little dry but no major complaints.
Delicious coffee and treats, and the staff is fantastic! Two thumbs up :)

This has become one of my favorite spots to get my day started off right! The staff is always so personable and friendly, the coffee is unmatched by any other in the Greater Charlotte area, and the ambiance is so comfy. My boyfriend and I come here at least a few times a week for a reason! Highly recommend for anyone looking for a go-to cafe spot.

Summit Coffee is easily one of the best coffee shops in the Charlotte area, my girlfriend and I frequent this location all the time and have tried other coffee locations in the area and keep coming back to this location. From the atmosphere and large seating area to the friendly staff and delicious coffee Summit Coffee is one of our favorite places to go and hang out.
Wonderful boho atmosphere with fresh coffees served with a smile
I got espresso. It is good. Also, I wanted to try their nitro cold brew in a small cup and that was really good!
This place is VERY kid friendly due to the location, just FYI! I love the atmosphere, I only wish Summit would offer fresh house coffee rather than the push dispenser kind.
Great cafe with exceptional service. Naee and Parker will treat you like family
came here for the first time & tried the summer camp matcha ... omg! 10/10 I loved it , best matcha I've had this far

Hands down the best crew! I came in for the first time this past week (8/11-8/12) and the staff on shift were awesome! I ordered an iced vanilla oat milk latte, and a pastry and both were delicious. Staff were so friendly and took the time to share their thoughts on areas to live in as I had brought up being an out of town visitor. I look forward to returning here on my next work trip, and maybe in the future move to the area. Thank you for the hospitality!

First time visiting Summit Coffee and I was not disappointed! Needed a spot to study so I hunkered down in the corner with a cup of drip coffee, and later a chocolate scone (rec from Darian? I'm terrible with names!) Delicious scone! I recommend as well  I could tell that the team behind the counter love what they do because there was such a positive vibe with each customer interaction. Service is impeccable. It's an intimate spot for studying, conversation, card-playing, or simply relaxing during the day.
Local artist work adorn the walls...LOVE that!! I will definitely be back  Thanks for a great experience!
Great experience. Nice and chill atmosphere. Good food and drinks. Very clean inside, outside, and the bathrooms.
Good coffee drinks and great atmosphere. Service is very friendly.

Awesome place to get some work done or meet up with a friend! Staff is super friendly and service is very fast. Vibes are immaculate, Wi-Fi is super reliable, and coffee is great. Would definitely recommend!

the atmosphere was amazing. the vibes were immaculate. the staff was wonderful and so so friendly and sweet. the coffee was beyond amazing and so intricately created! will definitely make a trip out here to stop again!!!
Stopped in from out of town, vibe was amazing, drinks were amazing (hibiscus berry lemonade frozen and a blue sky), and the staff were phenomenal!!
LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!! Every time I'm in Charlotte I have to make a stop! The summit on the plaza is my favorite by far, the vibes are UNMATCHED. Always good music and even better baristas!

Great coffee and great service! Enjoyed the Marshmellow Syrup.

-1 Star for not having updated prices. Was charged a different price than listed
I'm from out of town and wanted a chill place to sit with a cup of coffee after a red eye flight. Good vibes, great coffee, and patient and kind baristas.

The coffee and food is incredible! The atmosphere is very cozy and a lovely spot for a great cup of coffee. It is also fun that they have seasonal flavors that are always delicious. The staff is always so sweet no matter what location you go to. Most definitely recommend coming here!!
Lovely place to sit and unwind. Great coffee, great people, great vibes. 10/10 will come again
Great place to grab coffee and a pastry - also love the music selection, so it has a great vibe.
Really great coffee spot! I'm from out of town and love finding local spots. Good seating, cool, clean atmosphere, coffee and the small breakfast bar I ordered were good. Recommend!
Good vibes, parking will probably never be a problem, not too busy so it's great for meeting up with friends or for studying.
Fave Charlotte coffee shop :) Great music, drinks, service, staff and atmosphere. Always clean, pleasant and great to hang.
Pretty good! As good a coffee spot as any.
Great service, great coffee. Love the atmosphere!
My favorite coffee shop in town. Coffee is meticulously prepared by a great crew.
Delicious lattes and friendly staff! My go-to coffee shop.
Always a good time running with everyone on Fridays at 6:15am and then enjoying a good coffee afterwards.

I really like Summit Coffee! The interior is modern and cozy, with comfortable chairs, and it's a quiet place to work or study. They have good coffee and pastries, including a vegan pumpkin chocolate chip bar that my son devoured quickly.

I also appreciate that the space is kid-friendly! There are coloring pages and crayons, board books as well as some paperback novels and board games. There's also a stepstool in the bathroom for reaching the sink.

I got the strawberries and cream coffee (seasonal drink) and it was so good! I think when I visited before, I had a lavender latte and that was yummy. They also will substitute oat or almond milk without an upcharge.

It's located in a new shopping center on The Plaza, with a few other businesses in the same building. They have a nice outdoor patio.
Had one of the seasonal iced drinks and really enjoyed the everything Danish. Great and friendly staff.
My croissant was stale. But the English breakfast tea was superb!

We loved the coffee  especially their Cappuccino is worth trying!! They sell selective beers  as well. A cafe to work/study while sipping your desired coffee or just have fun playing any of the board games they offer (We picked Jenga ) The good thing is they do have handicap pathway inside the cafe. Staff was very friendly and attentive
Very cool low-key kind of atmosphere. Staff was great, friendly and knowledgeable.
Lovely location, staff was fantastic, coffee was delicious - 10/10
Their seasonal menus are the best in Charlotte. They always have something new and creative. The black coffee is great too if you're not into lattes.

Coffee that you expect from Summit and a fun new location! This is a great space tucked away from the busy plaza road that makes you feel isolated. Unlike some of the other coffee shop in the area this one has a very paced vibe, great for working, reading and having a causal conversation. For the surrounding neighborhoods this was a fantastic addition.
The blueberry coffee was one of the best coffees I ever had!

I come in here a couple times a week on average and I've only ever had excellent coffee. The staff here is very kind and quick also. There's a lot of seating, plenty of outlets, a printer, some pastries and bagels, and a big parking lot.
Love this place! Their snow day is the best drink. And my daughter loved the place  because it has so many books to read and coloring pages :) Very thoughtful!

Great coffee - Even better vibes! Everytime I go to this coffee shop I'm just in Awe! Wow! The customer service is out of this world. They will re pull a shot for you if it isn't perfect. And every single time I go my cup of coffee is perfection. Here me PERFECTION! The staff is super friendly and happy and that vibe just rubs of on you too. A great start to your day!

A quiet coffee shop tucked away on the plaza. I came in for my first time last week, and the coffee was very tasty. I got the blueberry cold brew, which was surprisingly tasty. I don't usually like fruit flavors mixed with coffee, but this was very good and tasted like they use real blueberries to make the sauce. Think Starbucks cold foam, but blueberry style lol. I can't wait to come back and stay to get some work done.
Tasty drinks and pastries are served in a comforting, plant-filled space. The chairs at indoor tables are comfortable and the music is low in volume, but high in quality.
Decent coffee, but they don't have white chocolate, really? I was a little harsher in my first draft of this, so I rewrote it to be more kind. We all deserve that right?
A great atmosphere with top-notch coffee!! Grateful for Summit's presence in CLT!
This is the place for you if you appreciate a good coffee and nice atmosphere.

I just met with a friend here off his recommendation and I'm glad I trusted his judgement. This establishment is quiet, cozy and the ambiance is lovely. I ordered a whole milk cortado and the taste is exquisite. I will be here again
The food menu is limited but they do have tasty and healthy options.
Their seasonal latte was insanely delish & staff was wonderful. It's a great spot to catch up with friends or get a little work done (they have a printer)!
Has a great vibe, very relaxed. Staff is super sweet and welcoming. Had the pumpkin latte and it was good!
Cute, spacious cafe with some art.
1st time here but looking forward to coming back! Great working/lounge spaces in/outside. The iced chai w oat milk was just the right balance of spice w some sweetness.
Great, small to homey coffee shop where you can sit and chat or just hang out. They know their coffee and tea and they even have beer.

Very nice place, the two girls are very amazing
The food and the beverage were great
Best customer service I've received in years! Which is a nice addition to the warm ambiance and good coffee.
Great coffee and great customer service

I love coming here to work! All the staff is lovely but I had a really sweet experience with Darian today - she didn't know it was a rough day for me, but she went out of her way to make our 2-minute interaction really personable and made my day so much better. There are a lot of places in Charlotte that serve good drinks, but the best places are the ones where the staff know their jobs are more than just serving coffee.

I wanted to see what  5 star business was like..........
Great service and coffee  
* thanks for the vibe*

summit is my favorite local chain(ish) coffee shop. their bean is excellent, baristas are highly skilled, and the shop atmosphere is always lovely. Summit on the Plaza is no exception!

I love this location because there is ample parking, it's easy to access on my way to and fro, and there's plenty of seating both inside and on the patio. The baristas are super kind and knowledgeable, and their pastry case stays stocked with delicious pastries. They also have a fridge with a few non coffee options (seltzer waters, local craft beers, etc.) if you're not in the mood for coffee. Maybe my favorite thing is that they don't upcharge alternative milks.

They do also have an app available that is very functional and allows mobile ordering as well as a rewards program - great for busy mornings.
Great spot for a quiet coffee or a beer!

The workers here are fantastic and the coffee is always made very thoughtfully and sincerely!! The vibes are also very relaxing and easy to do work in! There's plenty of tables and pillows for your comfort if you want to work in here! The outside seating is also really really nice!!
Really nice and chill inside. Friendly staff and enjoyed their vegan energy bar!
My favorite local coffee spot. The seasonal drinks never disappoint and every staff member I've ever encountered has been genuinely pleasant and super helpful.
Best coffee shop in the area!

Summit Coffee is a beautiful neighborhood coffee shop located right in between Plaza-Midwood and Villa Hights, just a walking distance from and to both neighborhoods.
They have great selection of craft coffee and a good variety of other drinks as well and snacks.

They do a wonderful job in promoting other small businesses in the neighborhood, as they display beautiful Moroccan Rugs for sale, unique high quality hats and other creative pieces that all belong to small businesses in the area.
Delicious coffee, welcoming staff, great price.
I love it here. The barista had remembered me and my drink from last time. The drinks are soo good
Great spot. Love having them in the same building as our babrer shop. Check them out asap

Great flavor, friendly baristas (no 'tudes), and gentle atmosphere. Sure, lots of outlets available is cool, but really good coffee. Today I left another new Plaza Midwood shop for it. Worth it! Thanks, Tasha and Lisa!!!
Great coffee! My husband and I love coming here to work.
Great addition to the neighborhood.  I had a Chai Latte and it was delicious and served by friendly staff.
I've been to this location twice & both times had a great experience! Coffee is always on point, and the customer service here really shines. It's a chill  spot to post up & work, highly recommend!
Summit coffee is a great place. Coffee was the best. Everyone was very professional and kind. Enjoyed breakfast
Some of the best coffee I've ever had, with excellent service to boot.

I love coming into this store. The vibe and decor are so inviting. Every person I've had the pleasure of speaking to that works here has been extremely kind and pleasant. The pastries are yummy and the drinks are delicious. Overall, I just am so excited to have Summit in the neighborhood!
Great coffee and great environment

Incredible. Their vanilla latte serves up everything you could ever hope for from a latte. Also the blue skies. Wow. Just wow. The baristas were so friendly and the ambiance was delightfully relaxed. You better believe I'll be back.
Awesome new coffee and treats spot in Plaza Midwood!
Good coffee and delicious pastry. Would hit this up often if I lived in the area.
They made the best Matcha latte that I have ever had, was very impressed! #teamSummit
Super cute coffee shop with plenty of seating and great coffee and bagels!
Nice chill spot to get a coffee and the employees are cool!

As a Davidson grad, Summit will always have a special place in my heart! This location is great, interior vibe is on point (lots of space for working or a coffee date and good music the day I was there) and the coffee, most important part, is . Baristas were also nice and knowledgeable. Recommend!
Still a little hidden compared to other coffee shops around here
Great coffee! I live 150 ft from Summit. Grateful that they moved into the neighborhood.
Super laid back. Very friendly atmosphere, great place to sit back and relax having a great cup of coffee!!
Great coffee and service. Such a cute place!
Great vibes, super cute inside, and fantastic menu!! I've loved every single thing I've put in my mouth here, and you will too!!
Been going to the other locations for while. Was happy to see this place added. It's a wonderful building and spacious on the inside. Summit has some of the best coffee we've had.
Such a relaxing atmosphere.  The baristas are wonderful!!! They are a wealth of knowledge.  The coffee is fabulous!! I highly recommend this location.

Such a great new coffee spot. The staff and management are friendly and do a great job, and the coffee is fantastic! It's a very clean and aesthetically pleasing shop as well!
There's ample indoor and outdoor space to work/study and it's ideal for hanging out for a few hours to get some tasks done.

I've been continually impressed by Summit Coffee - On the Plaza! They have had such a smooth opening that speaks highly of the owners/manager. They are consistent, make fantastic coffee and have put together the best team! 10/10 recommend! Plus it's an adorable + clean space that is great for remote work.
Amazing ambience and great coffee. Ideal place to hangout or study. Will definitely come again.

It's great to have Summit in the neighborhood! Chill vibes, great people, and a relaxing ambiance make this my new go-to cafe. We've been a couple times since it's opened and if you're looking for a place to catch up with friends, work, or just hang out, Summit is the spot. The crew here keeps the place super clean, they provide plenty of options for beverages and host local, live music from time to time. Thanks for the great coffee, great people, and great times!
Great Coffee. Great People. Great Location.
What a great new location for Summit Coffee. Today had a chai and a scone and they were both great. Outdoor and indoor seating make for a great coffee shop in this part of town. Recommend.
Great place to grab a coffee with the whole family -- also has a great wine selection for evenings on the patio!
Great vibe, service, and coffee!  Highly recommend !!!

The drip coffee, chai tea latte, and chocolate chip scone were all delicious! The staff was extremely friendly and quick to get our order ready. We had plenty of space to bring our stroller in and find a cozy spot inside. We will be making it a regular stop for our family!
Came here a couple times for their opening weekend, and everything was great! Even when they were swamped the service was quick and friendly, and the coffee is fantastic.
Great coffee, kind owners and staff, wonderful patio. Such an gem of an addition to the neighborhood!

Glad to have the new addition to the hood!  Job well done on the building renovation - cozy spot for your morning ritual or to gather with friends. Wonderful staff and delicious coffee. Find Your Summit!
